ingredients.ingredient: 2 cups shredded sharp Cheddar cheese, divided
1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained, divided

cookingTips: Microwave sweet potatoes until tender, then cool slightly before filling quesadillas
Spread cheese and beans evenly across each tortilla for balanced filling
Cook quesadillas over medium heat until the cheese melts and the tortilla is crispy
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Explain how sweet potatoes create a fun Halloween element and how to balance filling for even cooking. Guide on achieving crispy, cheesy quesadillas.
